title: PARKNAV
subtitle: Smart Parking Solution
summary: Developed a robust parking availability website

title: MallXP
subtitle: Everything your Mall offers, in your pocket
summary: Everything your Mall offers, in your pocket

title: NEXUS Teacher system / ERP
subtitle: Intelligent Attendance System
summary: Developed a Teacher ERP system utilizing IBM Cloud services, featuring automated attendance tracking via facial recognition. Implemented Python-based image processing and machine learning to streamline attendance procedures, significantly reducing administrative workload.

title: Popcorn Picks
subtitle: Personalized Movie Recommendations
summary: Personalized movie recommendations web app based on your tastes and community trends. Discover new films, explore details, and refine suggestions.

title: Digital Dynamics
subtitle: Dynamic Tech Website
summary: A dynamic and engaging tech website prototype. Through fluid animations and interactive prototyping, it illustrates how motion can enhance user understanding and create a compelling digital presence for technology-driven content.

title: Spotify Card
subtitle: Interactive Music Card
summary: This project recreates the engaging hover interaction found on Spotify music cards. Explore how text elements animate smoothly upon mouseover, providing additional information and enhancing the user experience.

title: Vehicle Verse
subtitle: Interactive Car Showcase
summary: This Figma project showcases an interactive car model display where users can seamlessly switch between different car models. As the model changes, the accompanying text dynamically updates to reflect the specifications and details of the selected vehicle, demonstrating a compelling way to present product variations.

title: TrekTail (Logo)
subtitle: Adventure Brand Identity
summary: The TrekTail logo fuses a rugged paw print with the precise detail of a shoe tread, symbolizing the spirit of exploration, resilience, and individuality.

title: Credo
subtitle: Financial Platform
summary: Innovative financial platform designed to simplify credit management and financial planning with modern UI/UX.
